import React, {useState} from "react"; import "./styles.css" function Form(){ const [formu, setFormu] = useState({ nome:"", // POE IGUAL AO DE LA PELO AMOR email:"", password:"", pswConfirm:"" }); function handleOnChange(node){ const {name, value} = node.target setFormu({...formu, [name]: value}) console.log(formu) } function msgSucesso(node){ alert('Dados inseridos: ' +node.target.value) } return(
) } export default Form;
